Author: dontcareifithurts__
Text: Yeah, usually when I attempt to eat like a "normal" person, it's just binging.   Whether the binge lasts a day or months, it's always just binging.   I cannot maintain weight unless it's accidental. Like, me trying to lose weight and failing at losing weight. I'm really good at being bad at losing weight, while still starving myself a lot of the time and having to deal with the side effects of a restrictive eating disorder.
